meanings.definition: People or creatures living in a wild or uncultivated area.
meanings.sent1: The wildlings roamed freely in the forest, enjoying the untouched nature.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of wildlings camping near the river.
meanings.sent3: The wildlings decided to have a picnic in the middle of the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The city streets seemed tame compared to the wildlings' habitat.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the wildlings' way of life.

meanings.definition: Plants that grow in the wild without human cultivation.
meanings.sent1: The wildlings added a touch of beauty to the rugged landscape.
meanings.sent2: Wildlings like daisies and dandelions can be found along the roadside.
meanings.sent3: The garden looked like a jungle with all the wildlings growing everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The wildlings in the forest seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of colorful wildlings swaying gently.
